LanguageData.MealNutrientPaste.label: nutrient paste meal
LanguageData.MealNutrientPaste.description: A synthetic mixture of protein, carbohydrates, vitamins, amino acids and minerals. Everything the body needs with an absolutely disgusting taste.
LanguageData.soylentgreen.label: soylent green
LanguageData.soylentgreen.description: Soylent Green is made from people, corpses that is. The taste varies from person to person.
